# ubyon Provider

Ubyon provider for Terraform.

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    ubyon = {
      source  = "Ubyon/ubyon"
      version = "0.1.5"
    }
  }
}

provider "ubyon" {
  # Provider configuration options
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `api_key` (String) The Ubyon API key.
- `endpoint` (String) The Ubyon API endpoint. Default https://manage.ubyon.com/api/v1
